title: 06/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why he's not impressed with Bucks after their game 6 win over an exhausted Brooklyn Nets team. He believes it was time for the Mavericks to start over and begin rebuilding around Luke Doncic after releasing GM Donnie Nelson and head coach Rick Carlisle. He also points out the main difference between a player like Tom Brady and another great QB in Aaron Rodgers. Plus, NBA champion Antione Walker joins the show to react to Colin's list of the top 10 players in the NBA under 25.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
